name: Cursed Armory of Archibald the Terrible
name_original: Cursed Armory of Archibald the Terrible
description:
Demo version of 2D beat 'em up which features 1-4 intrepid adventurers delving into the dangerous domain of a lich named Archibald the Terrible.

Autumn 2020 student project.

Controls:

For keyboard

  • Arrows or WASD - move
  • SPACE - interact
  • E - special ability
  • MOUSE LEFT CLICK  - Primary skill
  • MOUSE RIGHT CLICK  - Secondary skill
  • ESC - Pause menu

For gamepad

  • LEFT STICK - move
  • X - Weapon attack
  • A - Interact
  • B - Secret skill
  • Y - Secondary skill
  • START - Pause menu

Please note:

Player amount is set out by how many game pads are plugged plus the keyboard.
